description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d8ks5","text":"Cathepsin D assay is a fluorescence-based assay that leverage on the activity of cathepsin D, a lysosomal enzyme, to monitor the intactness of lysosome in the cell. Here, we describe a method where we used the measurement of cathepsin D activity to verify the intactness of lysosomes that were isolated from HEK293 cells based on anti-TMEM192 Lyso-IP. Our data showed an increase in the cathepsin D activity of lysosomal fraction when compared with whole cell fraction and Mock-IP fraction, an indication that the lysosomes are intact and viable.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Seeding cells and performing Lyso-IP with anti-TMEM192 beads
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7opk8","text":"Seed HEK293 cells in 15cm plates and allow to reach 80-90% confluency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Seeding cells and performing Lyso-IP with anti-TMEM192 beads
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7maik","text":"Perform Lyso-IP (using anti-TMEM192 beads) and Mock-IP (using BSA coated beads) as previously described in dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.x54v9yp51g3e/v1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":48}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9E71A34B0E0911EFA8B90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.x54v9yp51g3e/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bk78q","text":"Add   of protein from Lyso-IP and whole cell lysate into the wells FLUOTAC flat bottom black 96-well plate. This should be done in duplicate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cng9t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bpc9b","text":"Top up to  with lysis buffer provided in the kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4vnvv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59mfq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7cc0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cu1mo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap9ku","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"er6em","text":"Due to little or no protein in the Mock-IP, use equal volume as Lyso-IP sample.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fup6o","text":"Prepare Blank sample in duplicate. This should contain only lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"663kk","text":"Prepare a reaction master mix for 9 wells:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b87ar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1mdp","text":"  reaction buffer (from the kit) per well.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b4agq","text":"  substrate (from the kit)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6p5ah","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4srh3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnq2g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eb9in","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"450","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"18","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9h6el","text":"Although there are 8 wells to be used, however make master mix for 9 wells to account for pipetting error.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cf6du","text":"If performing assays for more samples/replicates, adjust master mix accordingly.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ah9r5","text":"Add   of master mix into each well. Gently mix but avoid bubbles. Cover plate with foil to avoid light exposure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9je76","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"52","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vkfq","text":"Start the ClarioStar plate reading machine and initiate the software. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f357o","text":"Set reading time to   for 24 cycles. This is total reading time of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"djh15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b36l2","text":"Highlight and name the virtual wells, ensuring they correspond with the orientation of the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5r8c6","text":"Open the plate holder and insert plate. Remember to remove foil covering before inserting the plate into the equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bcar5","text":"After the completion of the run, export data in excel format and analyse it using GraphPad Prism.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctsub","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ttri","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es1gc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9o2qq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":343,"id":467203,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"emdgr\",\"text\":\"Figure 1: Cathepsin D activity showed that the purified lysosomes are intact and retain their content. After IP, Measure Cathepsin D activity from 2ug of protein obtained from lysosomal fraction and whole cell fraction while the Mock-IP serves as negative control. N=2\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qiifbixhx.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qiidbixhx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qiiebixhx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qiicbixhx.webp","width":550}}}}
